item.title: Identification Atlas of Birds of Aragon
item.author: dylan@dyve.net (Dylan Verheul)
item.description: The Identification Atlas of Birds of Aragon is an amazing collection of PDF’s (of up to 6MB in size) of various birds that can be found in Aragon, Spain. Very useful for birders that visit Europe. Great pictures of specific differences between species. Thank you, Javier Blasco
